Articles.Content:
Hello!

Been watching the forum for a bit now so thought I'd contribute!

Bit about me -

Enjoy flying big craft into orbit. Bit n useless at rendezvous but got docking licked. Next big project will be a munar base!

Welcome! Not to break your dreams but unless you have made it to the mun or mimus and make a good sky-crane its not going to end well. Also when the mod developers catch up with .21 you might want to look at getting some mods. It will improve game play experience big time.
I can get to mun/minimus no problem. I'm not a stranger to mods either. Use kerbal engineer redux and the procedural fairings quite a bit!
